title.label: Pointless if it won't save scores

content.label:
This is a great game when it works right. But the previous version stopped working in GameCenter, and now this new version won't save any of your scores locally, either. Which, as another reviewer pointed out, kind of defeats the whole purpose. 

I love this game, but the developers have shown that they're not interested in delivering a quality product.

Edit: the local score problem is still not fixed. If you like writing your scores down, then I guess this game could still be fun for you...

Another edit: years later, they still haven’t fixed the bug where you can’t turn off the sound. There’s a control that looks like you’re turning it down, but it does nothing. It also looks terrrible, but I could accept that. They either need to remove this from the App Store or fix the simple bug with the sound and scores.

title.label: More MAPS for original Fieldrunners game!

content.label:
Love the original Fieldrunners game!
Want more MAPS!!!
Don’t like the suggestion that App Store recommends. Don’t need or want the stories that you have to do to get to the action.

It’s pretty stupid at this point

title.label: Don’t Buy if using IphoneXR or Newer

content.label: It was a great game on phones that have a home button. Any iPhone with a swipe up home button will make tower placements wrong or closing the app when dragging towers around. I don’t buy apps often but if I do I expect the game to work great and be smooth and work on any phone version kinda want a refund but oh well.

title.label: Need update for iPhone XS Max

content.label: The screen frame is not fit. The grid button is not working. Only one volume control bar and only controls the click sound, niether the music nor the game sound.
Remember playing this on my Xbox 360.  You guys should bring it to the BC program on Xbox.

Most addictive game I have ever had played. For real.
Classic game
No gameplay sound. Used to play back in the day. Update to sound and its perfect.
Like the game it’s way better than Fieldrunners2 I just like Fieldrunners way better
Love this game on Ps3 and also have been playing on my iPhone XS max, have not ran into any problems, been smooth running so far

I bought the expansion years ago for mudslide and after upgrading my phone, the app will not restore that purchase. It is not saving my scores and when went to delete and reinstall to try to fix the problem, it deleted my newly purchased lava flow level and will not restore purchases still!! So now I’ve wasted money TWICE for levels that will not restore. Very disappointing!!

title.label: Does not work well on iPhone X

content.label: I had this game a long time ago on the original iPod Touch and absolutely loved it.  I just bought it on my iPhone X and it will not allow you to see the whole game grid in turn making the game unbeatable.  I would like a fix or refund
I’ve owned this for years it’s always been a fun way to kill a few minutes

I really like tower games and this is the classic. But I wouldn’t buy it again since I use iPhone X. Much of the screen is off screen and you constantly must move the screen while playing and often the towers get placed wrong. Disappointing that almost a year after the x release, the developer hasn’t corrected the game.
Had the game for nearly 10 years, still best app I have ever played.

Fieldrunners has now been around for almost 10 years and it's just as colorful, fun and addicting as it was then. 
I can lose hours playing this game.
I have searched and searched, and there is no way to turn the music off in this game.  Bizarre. This makes the game pretty much useless.
I would like volume controls for effects and music. Also a 4x speed option. I would buy the other map packs if these items were fixed. Thanks. I hope you will follow up on this.
This game is amazing and totally worth every penny the only thing I need is to have a way to gain lives like advertisements or something you can kill to get more lives

Fact, Field-runners is the best game for the iPhone!

PLEASE KEEP MONTHLY UPDATES
I like playing, but on my IPHONE 6 will crash every time try to resume game. Happens on Fieldrunners2 also
Game play ok but I can't turn off the music

title.label: Waist of money when compared to Fieldrunners2

content.label: I played Fieldrunners2 which was a lot of fun and worth my time but bought Fieldrunners the original to play thinking it would be better since it costs money. Well I was wrong. There's only 3 LEVELS you're able to play and another 3 that cost additional money. Plus the towers are crap, there's only 5 towers to choose from which are the most basic towers. Graphics are also terrible and very hard to follow. The levels are super easy and you don't unlock things. Fieldrunners2 is extremely fun and free so when compared this app, Fieldrunners2 should be the one that costs money. In the end it's a complete waist of money, and wouldn't be worth your time even if it was free.
Crashes constantly on my iPhone 7+.  Rather, I mean, it fails to boot when resuming a saved game.  This forces me to have to start over.  Installed the most recent update... Still has the issue.
Whenever I try to place a weapon on the left side of the board, it ends up dropping it where I don't want it.
It would even be greater if the endless feature came back

Why can I not play extended or endless?? I bought the bundle, and decided I prefer the original over the new version. However I am stuck on classic mode instead of the other features. Do I have to pay more money to get them??? Hardly seems fair...
